mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AB_DOC ( ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SEQ}, #{IP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_WID}, #{IMG_HGT}, #{IMG_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_SRC_SIZ}, #{IMG_RSLT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_RSLT_SIZ}, #{SHAPES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_WID}, #{THUMB_HGT}, #{THUMB_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_SRC_SIZ}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} ORDER BY SEQ
